title: Name variables
text: Let $$n$$ $$=$$ the first number and $$m$$ $$=$$ the second number.

title: Equations
text: We know the sum of the two numbers is $$-26$$, and that one number is $$12$$ less than the other. Using this, we can create two equations. One is $$n+m=-26$$, and the other $$n=m-12$$

title: Solve
